system.description: Effect: Can only be used if you have at least 1 @Affliction[stockpile] Stack. You spend all of your @Affliction[stockpile] Stacks to heal 6 Ticks per @Affliction[stockpile] Stack spent.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.description: Effect: Can only be used if you have at least 1 @Affliction[stockpile] Stack. You spend all of your @Affliction[stockpile] Stacks to heal 6 Ticks per @Affliction[stockpile] Stack spent.
